ca.ualberta.cs.oneclick_cookbook

Class ManagePantryActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ca.ualberta.cs.oneclick_cookbook.ManagePantryActivity

  • public class ManagePantryActivity
extends Activity
    Class that allows for the addition of ingredients to the pantry. Similar in functionality to the add ingredients screen.
    Author:
    Kenneth Armstrong

        public boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu menu)

      • refresh

        public void refresh()
        Function that is called whenever the screen should be updated. Updates the spinners and the list view to provide immediate feedback

      • setUpSpinner

        public void setUpSpinner()
        Function that sets up the ingredient measurement spinner.

      • setUpListView

        public void setUpListView()
        Function that sets up the list view that contains the ingredients. Allows for immediate feedback to the user.

      • onAdd

        public void onAdd()
        Function that is called when the user clicks the add ingredient button. Adds the ingredient to the recipe.

      • onDeleteAll

        public void onDeleteAll()
        Function that is called when the user clicks on the delete all button. Deletes all of the ingredients in he pantry and updates the list view.

      • onDone

        public void onDone()
        Function that is called when the user clicks done. Ends the activity.

      • clickHandler

        Function that handles the clicks from a user
        Parameters:
        v - The view of the button that was clicked
